[[File:SLIDE 2.jpg|vignette|Mammary asymmetry, left breast inflamed and edematous, orange peel appearance]]
[[File:Slide 3.jpg|vignette|Mammary retraction ("axe-like") opposite the 3 o'clock radius of the left breast]]

question.title: What is the most common type of breast skin lesion/anomaly?
question.description: Bloody/lactescent discharge, flat spot, inflamed breast

option_a.title: Mammary asymmetry
option_a.description: A difference in the size or shape of the breasts

option_b.title: Mammary retraction
option_b.description: A pulling or pulling-like appearance of the breast tissue

option_c.title: Mammary hyperplasia
option_c.description: An increase in the number of cells in the breast tissue

option_d.title: Mammary fibroadenoma
option_d.description: A benign tumor of the breast tissue
